title: Game randomly freezing but can type
body:
Been happening all day.. I'll be in a game.. Then out of the blue the game will just STOP... i can see EVERYTHING happening around me but i can't move or take any action at all.. Half the time i can type just fine to my team.. and in all chat.. but my character accepts no commands at all.. 

So basically i die.. Good game free lp for enemy team... 

My ping is showing a steady 48 the entire time.. and my internet is fine.. I went as far as alt tabbing and loading a few webpages on my side screen during one of these freezes.. 


Other times game will basically skip.. Nothing nothin nothing... Grey screen.. WTF IS HAPPENING.. the game is basically unplayable right now

replies.body:
It sounds like you're experiencing a combination of issues here.  The extended delay you're having with low ping suggests that you're having a packet loss issue.  On the other hand, coming to a grey screen could mean FPS issues due to a hardware or software problem.  I'd like to recommend some steps to help rule out some possibilities.  

As a first step, run a [Log Reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to check your network's connection for packet loss and other issues.  You'll receive a series of troubleshoot steps should any problems be found.  Let me know what you come up with, and we can take it from there!
Yep, sounds just like what is happening to me, idk why it's doing this but it would be nice if it would be fixed
